.image-box img{width:100%}dig-plugin[data-type="bildbox"] figure{padding:0 !important;margin:0 !important;border:none !important}dig-plugin[data-type="bildbox"] figure figcaption{font-family:"Roboto Condensed",sans-serif;color:#918e83;padding-top:10px}dig-plugin[data-type="bildbox"] .image img{position:absolute;top:50%;-webkit-transform:translate(-50%, -50%);transform:translate(-50%, -50%);left:50%;height:100%;width:auto}dig-plugin[data-type="bildbox"] .image img .fit{height:auto;width:100%}dig-plugin[data-type="bildbox"] .image{position:relative;width:100%;height:0;padding-bottom:56.33333333%;overflow:hidden;font-size:0;background-image:url("../../images/image-placeholder.jpg");background-repeat:no-repeat;background-position:center center;background-size:60% auto;background-attachment:scroll;background-color:#eff0f0;display:block;text-align:center}.mod-article--frm .mod-header-article{position:relative}.mod-article--frm .mod-header-article,.mod-article--frm .mod-article{display:block;max-width:40rem;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto}.mod-article--frm .mod-article&gt;figure
